definitions.meaning: 突出或强调某事的重要性
definitions.usage: 用于表达某事需要特别关注或优先考虑，常用于演讲、写作或对话中以突出观点。

examples.scene: 一位老师在课堂上向学生讲解如何准备期末考试，特别提到时间管理的重要性。
examples.chineseIdea: 老师想让学生明白，合理安排时间是考试成功的关键。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The teacher @ @ @ time management to ensure students succeed in their exams.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The teacher 「places emphasis on」 time management to ensure students succeed in their exams.
examples.chineseTranslation: 老师「特别强调」时间管理，以确保学生在考试中取得成功。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The teacher very stress time management.' 纠正：'The teacher places emphasis on time management.'

examples.scene: 公司经理在团队会议上讨论新项目，提醒大家关注客户反馈。
examples.chineseIdea: 经理希望团队优先考虑客户的需求和意见。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The manager @ @ @ customer feedback during the project planning.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The manager 「lays stress on」 customer feedback during the project planning.
examples.chineseTranslation: 经理在项目规划中「特别强调」客户反馈。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The manager very focus customer feedback.' 纠正：'The manager lays stress on customer feedback.'

definitions.meaning: 通过语言、语气或行动使某事物更明显
definitions.usage: 常用于通过语调、措辞或行为突出某一点，常见于口语或非正式场合。

examples.scene: 一位医生在社区健康讲座上向居民讲解预防流感的重要性，特别提到疫苗接种。
examples.chineseIdea: 医生希望居民意识到接种疫苗是预防流感的关键措施。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The doctor @ @ @ vaccination in preventing flu outbreaks.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The doctor 「stresses the need for」 vaccination in preventing flu outbreaks.
examples.chineseTranslation: 医生「强调了」疫苗接种在预防流感爆发中的必要性。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The doctor say vaccination is very important.' 纠正：'The doctor stresses the need for vaccination.'

examples.scene: 一位环保活动家在集会上呼吁大家关注塑料污染问题，特别提到减少一次性塑料。
examples.chineseIdea: 活动家希望通过演讲让大家注意到减少塑料使用的重要性。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The activist @ @ @ reducing single-use plastics in her speech.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The activist 「draws attention to」 reducing single-use plastics in her speech.
examples.chineseTranslation: 活动家在演讲中「强调了」减少一次性塑料的重要性。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'The activist talk about reduce plastics is important.' 纠正：'The activist draws attention to reducing single-use plastics.'
